entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 1:19PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Extreme Cold Temperatures Arrive Late This Weekend... A pattern change brings dry conditions, well below normal temperatures, and strong northerly winds to the panhandle starting late Friday night.
